original_title: Shakin All Over: Canadian Pop Music in the 1960s
overview: A joyful look at Canadian music from the 60s, that traces the evolution of a young industry with stories from such artists as Buffy Sainte-Marie, Lighthouse, Steppenwolf and the Guess Who, in harmony with a younger generation of stars.
title: Shakin All Over: Canadian Pop Music in the 1960s
